definition.de: Wechsel eine Teammitglieds von einem Team zu einem anderen
definition.dk: Markedet, hvor spillerne skifter fra et hold til et andet.
definition.en-GB: The transfer of an athlete from one team to another, the hiring or drafting of an athlete onto a team or the change in professional status of a player on a team
definition.en-US: The transfer of an athlete from one team to another, the hiring or drafting of an athlete onto a team or the change in professional status of a player on a team
definition.pt-BR: Mudança de um membro de uma equipe para outra.
definition.pt-PT: Mudança de um membro de uma equipa para outra.
definition.se: Marknaden där spelare byter från ett lag till ett annat.
